name: Warhol Shuffle
description:
FAQ

  • Q0: What am I supposed to do here?
    • A0: Return the pictures to their usual place. You can use the mouse or the arrow keys.
  • Q1: But how? They all look the same!?
    • A1: That's the point of this piece of art. Maybe check the reference: https://www.moma.org/collection/works/79809
  • Q2: Which one is missing?
    • A2: It could be any. Don't worry, It'll come back at the end.
  • Q3: Ok, but this is still impossible. Any help?
    • A3: Sure, try this: https://gamefaqs.gamespot.com/pc/197142-doom-ii/cheats
  • Q4: IDDQD
    • A4: That's not a question...

Made 01-02 May 2021 for https://itch.io/jam/paint-jam-2021
